languages.text: {n}Абеляр бросает на вас удивленный взгляд, но тут же придает себе невозмутимый вид.{/n} "Благодарю, Лорд-капитан".

traits.locale_text: {n}Абеляр бросает на вас удивленный взгляд, но тут же придает себе невозмутимый вид.{/n} "Благодарю, Лорд-капитан".

languages.text: {n}Abelard looks at you in surprise, but then immediately puts on an air of indifference.{/n} "Thank you, Lord Captain."
languages.original_text: {n}Абеляр бросает на вас удивленный взгляд, но тут же придает себе невозмутимый вид.{/n} "Благодарю, Лорд-капитан".

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard looks at you in surprise, but then immediately puts on an air of indifference.{/n} "Thank you, Lord Captain."
{n}Abelard looks at you in surprise, but then immediately puts on an air of indifference.{/n} "Thank you, Lord Captain."
{n}Abelard looks at you in surprise, but then immediately puts on an air of indifference.{/n} "Thank you, Lord Captain."
{n}Abelard looks at you in surprise, but then immediately puts on an air of indifference.{/n} "Thank you, Lord Captain."
{n}Abelard looks at you in surprise, but then immediately puts on an air of indifference.{/n} "Thank you, Lord Captain."

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德惊讶地看着你，但随后马上装出一副漠不关心的样子。{/n}“谢谢您，舰长大人。”
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard looks at you in surprise, but then immediately puts on an air of indifference.{/n} "Thank you, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德惊讶地看着你，但随后马上装出一副漠不关心的样子。{/n}“谢谢您，舰长大人。”

languages.text: {n}Abelard te mira, sorprendido, pero pronto adopta un aire de indiferencia.{/n} «Gracias, Lord Capitán».
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard looks at you in surprise, but then immediately puts on an air of indifference.{/n} "Thank you, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard te mira, sorprendido, pero pronto adopta un aire de indiferencia.{/n} «Gracias, Lord Capitán».

languages.text: {n}アベラルドが驚きのまなざしで見つめてきたが、すぐに無表情に戻る。{/n}「ありがとうございます、ロード・キャプテン様」
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard looks at you in surprise, but then immediately puts on an air of indifference.{/n} "Thank you, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: {n}アベラルドが驚きのまなざしで見つめてきたが、すぐに無表情に戻る。{/n}「ありがとうございます、ロード・キャプテン様」

languages.text: {n}Abelard blickt dich überrascht an, gibt sich dann aber sofort gleichgültig.{/n} "Danke, Lord Captain."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard looks at you in surprise, but then immediately puts on an air of indifference.{/n} "Thank you, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard blickt dich überrascht an, gibt sich dann aber sofort gleichgültig.{/n} "Danke, Lord Captain."

languages.text: {n}Abélard semble un instant pris de court, mais reprend très vite son flegme habituel.{/n} « Merci, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. »
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard looks at you in surprise, but then immediately puts on an air of indifference.{/n} "Thank you, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abélard semble un instant pris de court, mais reprend très vite son flegme habituel.{/n} « Merci, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. »

languages.text: {n}Abelard sana şaşırarak bakıyor, ardından anında duygusuz tavrına geri bürünüyor.{/n} "Teşekkür ederim Lord Kaptan."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard looks at you in surprise, but then immediately puts on an air of indifference.{/n} "Thank you, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard sana şaşırarak bakıyor, ardından duygusuz tavrına anında geri bürünüyor.{/n} "Teşekkür ederim Lord Kaptan."
